author: vmassol
msg: Added new Cactus article from Olexiy Prohorenko.

author: felipeal
msg: changed maven-war-plugin requirements to 1.6.1 instead of 1.7

author: vmassol
msg: First batch of changes to use Cargo instead of the <cactus> task. It is *NOT* in a working state. The next step is for me to add support for authentication properties in Cargo. I'm committing this to show the idea I currently have on how to use Cargo directly with Cactus (without wrapping it). It may or may not be too complex to use directly. If it is, then we'll need to do a thin wrapper around the Cargo tasks to bring to a level of comfort similar to the previous <cactus> task...

author: vmassol
msg: Added optional source attribute from the java plugin for compiling cactus tests. Thanks to Henner Kollmann
